[Digital Rights Management]

#include <Apoxi/AddOns/Drm/DrmRightsStore.hpp>

Detailed Description

DrmRightsObjectFile - Abstracts a Rights Object in the FFS. It serializes and de-serializes the DrmRightsObject to and from the FFS. This will be used by the DrmRightsStore.
